Package frc.robot

Class Lib4150DigitalOffDelay

java.lang.Object
frc.robot.Lib4150DigitalOffDelay
public class Lib4150DigitalOffDelay extends Object
Digital off delay class. This class delays a boolean transitioning from on to off by a configured amount of time.
File: Lib4150DigitalOffDelay.java

Referenceable items: (classes)
Lib4150DigitalOffDelay

Depends on:
none - no external libraries required

Operating system specifics:
None - transportable

Notes:

    • OffDelayExec

      public boolean OffDelayExec(boolean input)
      Executes the logic for the OffDelay object. System elapsed time is obtained from the FPGA.
      Parameters:
      input - - boolean - current raw input.
      Returns:
      output - boolean - results of OffDelay on the input.

    • OffDelayExec

      public boolean OffDelayExec(boolean input, double elapsedTimeSec)
      Executes the logic for the OffDelay object.
      Parameters:
      input - - boolean - current raw input.
      elapsedTimeSec - - double - current running system time, seconds.
      Returns:
      output - boolean - results of OffDelay on the input.
